and contains an assessment of the status of Iraq's WMD( weapons of mass destruction) biological, chemical and nuclear programs. Its contents are succinctly summarized in Donald Rumsfeld 's cover letter to Richard Myers , which states, Please take a look at this material as to what we don't know about WMD. It's big. As it turned out, that knowledge gap regarding WMD's was even bigger than Donald Rumsfeld or the intelligence community surmised. Downing Street communications chief. In a personal statement, Mr Andy Coulson said that the drip-drip of claims about illegal eavesdropping under his editorship meant he could not "give the 110% needed" . I stand by what I've said about those events but when the spokesman needs a spokesman it's time to move on, he added. The Prime Minister said he was "very sorry" Mr Andy Coulson felt "compelled" to go after months of intense pressure, insisting he was being "punished for the same offence twice

And he's incredible. I mean, he's an astronaut. He's going to lead the next space shuttle. He's not only brilliant and interesting, but he truly loves Gabrielle Giffords and that love was so ever present in that room. " Kirsten Gillibrand says that Gabrielle Giffords isn't speaking yet. " "Not yet, but she will. I know. I know. We just have to keep praying." "
